Moreover<S>1161</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, I declare<S>1107</S> unto you<S>5213</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> which<S>3739</S> I preached<S>2097</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, which<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> ye have received<S>3880</S>, and<S>2532</S> wherein<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> ye stand<S>2476</S>;
By<S>1223</S> which<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> ye are saved<S>4982</S>, if<S>1487</S> ye keep<S>2722</S> in memory what<S>5101</S> <S>3056</S> I preached<S>2097</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, unless<S>1622</S> <S>1508</S> ye have believed<S>4100</S> in vain<S>1500</S>. <sup>keep: or, hold fast</sup> <sup>what: Gr. by what speech</sup>
For<S>1063</S> I delivered<S>3860</S> unto you<S>5213</S> first of all<S>1722</S> <S>4413</S> that which<S>3739</S> I<S>3880</S> also<S>2532</S> received<S>3880</S>, how<S>3754</S> that Christ<S>5547</S> died<S>599</S> for<S>5228</S> our<S>2257</S> sins<S>266</S> according<S>2596</S> to the scriptures<S>1124</S>;
And<S>2532</S> that<S>3754</S> he was buried<S>2290</S>, and<S>2532</S> that<S>3754</S> he rose again<S>1453</S> the third<S>5154</S> day<S>2250</S> according<S>2596</S> to the scriptures<S>1124</S>:
And<S>2532</S> that<S>3754</S> he was seen<S>3700</S> of Cephas<S>2786</S>, then<S>1534</S> of the twelve<S>1427</S>:
After that<S>1899</S>, he was seen<S>3700</S> of above<S>1883</S> five hundred<S>4001</S> brethren<S>80</S> at once<S>2178</S>; of<S>1537</S> whom<S>3739</S> the greater part<S>4119</S> remain<S>3306</S> unto<S>2193</S> this present<S>737</S>, but<S>1161</S> some<S>5100</S> <S>2532</S> are fallen asleep<S>2837</S>.
After that<S>1899</S>, he was seen<S>3700</S> of James<S>2385</S>; then<S>1534</S> of all<S>3956</S> the apostles<S>652</S>.
And<S>1161</S> last<S>2078</S> of all<S>3956</S> he was seen<S>3700</S> of me also<S>2504</S>, as<S>5619</S> of one born out of due time<S>1626</S>. <sup>one: or, an abortive</sup>
For<S>1063</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> the least<S>1646</S> of the apostles<S>652</S>, that<S>3739</S> am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S> meet<S>2425</S> to be called<S>2564</S> an apostle<S>652</S>, because<S>1360</S> I persecuted<S>1377</S> the church<S>1577</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
But<S>1161</S> by the grace<S>5485</S> of God<S>2316</S> I am<S>1510</S> what<S>3739</S> I am<S>1510</S>: and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> grace<S>5485</S> which was bestowed upon<S>1519</S> me<S>1691</S> was<S>1096</S> not<S>3756</S> in vain<S>2756</S>; but<S>235</S> I laboured<S>2872</S> more abundantly<S>4054</S> than they<S>846</S> all<S>3956</S>: yet<S>1161</S> not<S>3756</S> I<S>1473</S>, but<S>235</S> the grace<S>5485</S> of God<S>2316</S> which<S>3588</S> was with<S>4862</S> me<S>1698</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> whether<S>1535</S> it were I<S>1473</S> or<S>1535</S> they<S>1565</S>, so<S>3779</S> we preach<S>2784</S>, and<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> ye believed<S>4100</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> Christ<S>5547</S> be preached<S>2784</S> that<S>3754</S> he rose<S>1453</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, how<S>4459</S> say<S>3004</S> some<S>5100</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> that<S>3754</S> there is<S>2076</S> no<S>3756</S> resurrection<S>386</S> of the dead<S>3498</S>?
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> there be<S>2076</S> no<S>3756</S> resurrection<S>386</S> of the dead<S>3498</S>, then<S>3761</S> is<S>1453</S> Christ<S>5547</S> not<S>3761</S> risen<S>1453</S>:
And<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> Christ<S>5547</S> be<S>1453</S> not<S>3756</S> risen<S>1453</S>, then<S>686</S> is our<S>2257</S> preaching<S>2782</S> vain<S>2756</S>, and<S>2532</S> your<S>5216</S> faith<S>4102</S> is <S>1161</S> also<S>2532</S> vain<S>2756</S>.
Yea<S>1161</S>, and<S>2532</S> we are found<S>2147</S> false witnesses<S>5575</S> of God<S>2316</S>; because<S>3754</S> we have testified<S>3140</S> of<S>2596</S> God<S>2316</S> that<S>3754</S> he raised up<S>1453</S> Christ<S>5547</S>: whom<S>3739</S> he raised<S>1453</S> not<S>3756</S> up<S>1453</S>, if<S>1512</S> so be<S>686</S> that the dead<S>3498</S> rise<S>1453</S> not<S>3756</S>.
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> the dead<S>3498</S> rise<S>1453</S> not<S>3756</S>, then is<S>1453</S> not<S>3761</S> Christ<S>5547</S> raised<S>1453</S>:
And<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> Christ<S>5547</S> be<S>1453</S> not<S>3756</S> raised<S>1453</S>, your<S>5216</S> faith<S>4102</S> is vain<S>3152</S>; ye are<S>2075</S> yet<S>2089</S> in<S>1722</S> your<S>5216</S> sins<S>266</S>.
Then<S>686</S> they also<S>2532</S> which are fallen asleep<S>2837</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> are perished<S>622</S>.
If<S>1487</S> in<S>1722</S> this<S>5026</S> life<S>2222</S> only<S>3440</S> we have hope<S>1679</S> <S>2070</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, we are<S>2070</S> of all<S>3956</S> men<S>444</S> most miserable<S>1652</S>.
But<S>1161</S> now<S>3570</S> is<S>1453</S> Christ<S>5547</S> risen<S>1453</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, and become<S>1096</S> the firstfruits<S>536</S> of them that slept<S>2837</S>.
For<S>1063</S> since<S>1894</S> by<S>1223</S> man<S>444</S> came death<S>2288</S>, by<S>1223</S> man<S>444</S> came also<S>2532</S> the resurrection<S>386</S> of the dead<S>3498</S>.
For<S>1063</S> as<S>5618</S> in<S>1722</S> Adam<S>76</S> all<S>3956</S> die<S>599</S>, even<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> shall<S>2227</S> all<S>3956</S> be made alive<S>2227</S>.
But<S>1161</S> every man<S>1538</S> in<S>1722</S> his own<S>2398</S> order<S>5001</S>: Christ<S>5547</S> the firstfruits<S>536</S>; afterward<S>1899</S> they that are<S>3588</S> Christ's<S>5547</S> at<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> coming<S>3952</S>.
Then<S>1534</S> cometh the end<S>5056</S>, when<S>3752</S> he shall have delivered up<S>3860</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> to God<S>2316</S>, even<S>2532</S> the Father<S>3962</S>; when<S>3752</S> he shall have put down<S>2673</S> all<S>3956</S> rule<S>746</S> and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> authority<S>1849</S> and<S>2532</S> power<S>1411</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he<S>846</S> must<S>1163</S> reign<S>936</S>, till<S>891</S> <S>3739</S> he hath put<S>302</S> <S>5087</S> all<S>3956</S> enemies<S>2190</S> under<S>5259</S> his<S>846</S> feet<S>4228</S>.
The last<S>2078</S> enemy<S>2190</S> that shall be destroyed<S>2673</S> is death<S>2288</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he hath put<S>5293</S> all things<S>3956</S> under<S>5259</S> his<S>846</S> feet<S>4228</S>. But<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> he saith<S>2036</S> <S>3754</S>, all things<S>3956</S> are put under<S>5293</S> him, it is manifest<S>1212</S> that<S>3754</S> he is excepted<S>1622</S>, which did put<S>5293</S> all things<S>3956</S> under<S>5293</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> all things<S>3956</S> shall be subdued<S>5293</S> unto him<S>846</S>, then<S>5119</S> shall<S>5293</S> the Son<S>5207</S> also<S>2532</S> himself<S>846</S> be subject<S>5293</S> unto him that put<S>5293</S> all things<S>3956</S> under<S>5293</S> him<S>846</S>, that<S>2443</S> God<S>2316</S> may be<S>5600</S> all<S>3956</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S>.
Else<S>1893</S> what<S>5101</S> shall they do<S>4160</S> which are baptized<S>907</S> for<S>5228</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, if<S>1487</S> the dead<S>3498</S> rise<S>1453</S> not<S>3756</S> at all<S>3654</S>? why<S>5101</S> <S>2532</S> are they then baptized<S>907</S> for<S>5228</S> the dead<S>3498</S>?
And<S>2532</S> why<S>5101</S> stand<S>2793</S> we<S>2249</S> in jeopardy<S>2793</S> every<S>3956</S> hour<S>5610</S>?
I protest by<S>3513</S> your<S>5212</S> rejoicing<S>2251</S> <S>2746</S> which<S>3739</S> I have<S>2192</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>, I die<S>599</S> daily<S>2596</S> <S>2250</S>. <sup>your: some read, our</sup>
If<S>1487</S> after the manner<S>2596</S> of men<S>444</S> I have fought with beasts<S>2341</S> at<S>1722</S> Ephesus<S>2181</S>, what<S>5101</S> advantageth it<S>3786</S> me<S>3427</S>, if<S>1487</S> the dead<S>3498</S> rise<S>1453</S> not<S>3756</S>? let us eat<S>5315</S> and<S>2532</S> drink<S>4095</S>; for<S>1063</S> to morrow<S>839</S> we die<S>599</S>. <sup>after: or, to speak after the manner of men</sup>
Be<S>4105</S> not<S>3361</S> deceived<S>4105</S>: evil<S>2556</S> communications<S>3657</S> corrupt<S>5351</S> good<S>5543</S> manners<S>2239</S>.
Awake<S>1594</S> to righteousness<S>1346</S>, and<S>2532</S> sin<S>264</S> not<S>3361</S>; for<S>1063</S> some<S>5100</S> have<S>2192</S> not the knowledge<S>56</S> of God<S>2316</S>: I speak<S>3004</S> this to<S>4314</S> your<S>5213</S> shame<S>1791</S>.
But<S>235</S> some<S>5100</S> man will say<S>2046</S>, How<S>4459</S> are<S>1453</S> the dead<S>3498</S> raised up<S>1453</S>? and<S>1161</S> with what<S>4169</S> body<S>4983</S> do they come<S>2064</S>?
Thou fool<S>878</S>, that which<S>3739</S> thou<S>4771</S> sowest<S>4687</S> is<S>2227</S> not<S>3756</S> quickened<S>2227</S>, except<S>3362</S> it die<S>599</S>:
And<S>2532</S> that which<S>3739</S> thou sowest<S>4687</S>, thou sowest<S>4687</S> not<S>3756</S> that body<S>4983</S> that shall be<S>1096</S>, but<S>235</S> bare<S>1131</S> grain<S>2848</S>, it may chance<S>1487</S> <S>5177</S> of wheat<S>4621</S>, or<S>2228</S> of some<S>5100</S> other<S>3062</S> grain:
But<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> giveth<S>1325</S> it<S>846</S> a body<S>4983</S> as<S>2531</S> it hath pleased him<S>2309</S>, and<S>2532</S> to every<S>1538</S> seed<S>4690</S> his own<S>2398</S> body<S>4983</S>.
All<S>3956</S> flesh<S>4561</S> is not<S>3756</S> the same<S>846</S> flesh<S>4561</S>: but<S>235</S> <S>3303</S> there is one<S>243</S> kind of flesh<S>4561</S> of men<S>444</S>,<S>1161</S> another<S>243</S> flesh<S>4561</S> of beasts<S>2934</S>,<S>1161</S> another<S>243</S> of fishes<S>2486</S>, and <S>1161</S> another<S>243</S> of birds<S>4421</S>.
There are also<S>2532</S> celestial<S>2032</S> bodies<S>4983</S>, and<S>2532</S> bodies<S>4983</S> terrestrial<S>1919</S>: but<S>235</S> <S>3303</S> the glory<S>1391</S> of the celestial<S>2032</S> is one<S>2087</S>, and<S>1161</S> the glory of the terrestrial<S>1919</S> is another<S>2087</S>.
There is one<S>243</S> glory<S>1391</S> of the sun<S>2246</S>, and<S>2532</S> another<S>243</S> glory<S>1391</S> of the moon<S>4582</S>, and<S>2532</S> another<S>243</S> glory<S>1391</S> of the stars<S>792</S>: for<S>1063</S> one star<S>792</S> differeth from<S>1308</S> another star<S>792</S> in<S>1722</S> glory<S>1391</S>.
So<S>3779</S> also<S>2532</S> is the resurrection<S>386</S> of the dead<S>3498</S>. It is sown<S>4687</S> in<S>1722</S> corruption<S>5356</S>; it is raised<S>1453</S> in<S>1722</S> incorruption<S>861</S>:
It is sown<S>4687</S> in<S>1722</S> dishonour<S>819</S>; it is raised<S>1453</S> in<S>1722</S> glory<S>1391</S>: it is sown<S>4687</S> in<S>1722</S> weakness<S>769</S>; it is raised<S>1453</S> in<S>1722</S> power<S>1411</S>:
It is sown<S>4687</S> a natural<S>5591</S> body<S>4983</S>; it is raised<S>1453</S> a spiritual<S>4152</S> body<S>4983</S>. There is<S>2076</S> a natural<S>5591</S> body<S>4983</S>, and<S>2532</S> there is<S>2076</S> a spiritual<S>4152</S> body<S>4983</S>.
And<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, The first<S>4413</S> man<S>444</S> Adam<S>76</S> was made<S>1096</S> <S>1519</S> a living<S>2198</S> soul<S>5590</S>; the last<S>2078</S> Adam<S>76</S> was made <S>1519</S> a quickening<S>2227</S> spirit<S>4151</S>.
Howbeit<S>235</S> that was not<S>3756</S> first<S>4412</S> which is spiritual<S>4152</S>, but<S>235</S> that which is natural<S>5591</S>; and afterward<S>1899</S> that which is spiritual<S>4152</S>.
The first<S>4413</S> man<S>444</S> is of<S>1537</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, earthy<S>5517</S>: the second<S>1208</S> man<S>444</S> is the Lord<S>2962</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
As<S>3634</S> is the earthy<S>5517</S>, such<S>5108</S> are they also<S>2532</S> that are earthy<S>5517</S>: and<S>2532</S> as is <S>3634</S> the heavenly<S>2032</S>, such<S>5108</S> are they<S>2032</S> also<S>2532</S> that are heavenly<S>2032</S>.
And<S>2532</S> as<S>2531</S> we have borne<S>5409</S> the image<S>1504</S> of the earthy<S>5517</S>, we shall<S>5409</S> also<S>2532</S> bear<S>5409</S> the image<S>1504</S> of the heavenly<S>2032</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> this<S>5124</S> I say<S>5346</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, that<S>3754</S> flesh<S>4561</S> and<S>2532</S> blood<S>129</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> inherit<S>2816</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>; neither<S>3761</S> doth<S>2816</S> corruption<S>5356</S> inherit<S>2816</S> incorruption<S>861</S>.
Behold<S>2400</S>, I shew<S>3004</S> you<S>5213</S> a mystery<S>3466</S>; We shall<S>2837</S> not<S>3756</S> all<S>3956</S> <S>3303</S> sleep<S>2837</S>, but<S>1161</S> we shall<S>236</S> all<S>3956</S> be changed<S>236</S>,
In<S>1722</S> a moment<S>823</S>, in<S>1722</S> the twinkling<S>4493</S> of an eye<S>3788</S>, at<S>1722</S> the last<S>2078</S> trump<S>4536</S>: for<S>1063</S> the trumpet shall sound<S>4537</S>, and<S>2532</S> the dead<S>3498</S> shall be raised<S>1453</S> incorruptible<S>862</S>, and<S>2532</S> we<S>2249</S> shall be changed<S>236</S>.
For<S>1063</S> this<S>5124</S> corruptible<S>5349</S> must<S>1163</S> put on<S>1746</S> incorruption<S>861</S>, and<S>2532</S> this<S>5124</S> mortal<S>2349</S> must put on<S>1746</S> immortality<S>110</S>.
So<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> this<S>5124</S> corruptible<S>5349</S> shall have put on<S>1746</S> incorruption<S>861</S>, and<S>2532</S> this<S>5124</S> mortal<S>2349</S> shall have put on<S>1746</S> immortality<S>110</S>, then<S>5119</S> shall be brought to pass<S>1096</S> the saying<S>3056</S> that is written<S>1125</S>, Death<S>2288</S> is swallowed up<S>2666</S> in<S>1519</S> victory<S>3534</S>.
O death<S>2288</S>, where<S>4226</S> is thy<S>4675</S> sting<S>2759</S>? O grave<S>86</S>, where<S>4226</S> is thy<S>4675</S> victory<S>3534</S>? <sup>grave: or, hell</sup>
<S>1161</S> The sting<S>2759</S> of death<S>2288</S> is sin<S>266</S>; and<S>1161</S> the strength<S>1411</S> of sin<S>266</S> is the law<S>3551</S>.
But<S>1161</S> thanks<S>5485</S> be to God<S>2316</S>, which<S>3588</S> giveth<S>1325</S> us<S>2254</S> the victory<S>3534</S> through<S>1223</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
Therefore<S>5620</S>, my<S>3450</S> beloved<S>27</S> brethren<S>80</S>, be ye<S>1096</S> stedfast<S>1476</S>, unmoveable<S>277</S>, always<S>3842</S> abounding<S>4052</S> in<S>1722</S> the work<S>2041</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, forasmuch as ye know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> your<S>5216</S> labour<S>2873</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> in vain<S>2756</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
